titles.title: LABEL Opioids Act
A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to require warning labels for prescription opioids, and for other purposes.
LABEL Opioids Act
Lessening Addiction by Enhancing Labeling Opioids Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services
Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation

bill.summary:
Lessening Addiction by Enhancing Labeling Opioids Act of 2018 or the LABEL Opioids Act
This bill requires certain prescription opioids to contain a warning label specifying that the opioids may cause dependence, addiction, and overdose.
